title: "Shikoku Island holds world landmark lookalike photography contest judged by AI"
excerpt: "So, Tourism Shikoku has come up with a really clever way to show off that it has some world class sights of its own to offer. The World Famous Spots Seen in Shikoku Contest is a unique photography competition that asked people to submit shots of places on the Island of Shikoku that look a lot like world landmarks."
